profile.name: Teja Naidu Chintha
profile.title: Data Scientist
profile.summary: Data Scientist with 4 years of experience building ML models and data pipelines across finance and healthcare. Skilled in fraud detection, forecasting, NLP, and scalable model deployment using Python, Spark, and TensorFlow. Cloud-certified (AWS, Azure, GCP) with a published research record and proven impact in improving accuracy, reducing risk, and driving actionable insights.

bullets: Improved fraud detection accuracy by 20% via anomaly detection & risk-scoring models on 50TB+ transactions.
Reduced ETL runtime by 35% by optimizing Spark/Scala pipelines with Airflow orchestration.
Cut compliance reporting cycle from weeks to days through automated pipelines and Power BI dashboards.
Mentored junior analysts in Python & Spark feature engineering; improved team productivity.
Enabled 15% faster decisions for product & risk teams by operationalizing model outputs.

experience.role: Data Scientist / Data Science Engineer II
bullets: Improved healthcare forecast accuracy by 18% with predictive models & NLP pipelines in TensorFlow & scikit-learn.
Reduced manual validation by 40% via Alteryx automation; orchestrated with Kubernetes, CI/CD, and ADF.
Delivered real-time Power BI dashboards by streaming model outputs from on-prem & Azure.
Mentored engineers on ETL, CI/CD, and deploying ML into scalable pipelines.
Improved retention insights via clustering & segmentation; informed business strategies.
Accelerated reporting by 40% through ML-ready features in SQL/Python.
Enhanced compliance monitoring with Power BI + anomaly detection; improved oversight.
Reduced reporting latency by 25% with automated ETL and executive-ready outputs.

projects.name: Fraud Detection System — Interactive Dashboard
highlights: ROC-AUC improved 0.61 → 0.99; PR-AUC 0.82 → 0.94 with XGBoost + GRU RNNs over 50M records.
Velocity windows & 'impossible travel' features for sequence-aware signals.
Interactive dashboard reduced false positives and enabled earlier detection.

projects.name: Multimodal Document Intelligence for Compliance (GenAI)
highlights: 60% faster compliance document review leveraging TAPAS + SciBERT + CLIP.
Context-aware retrieval & reasoning via LangGraph + BGE-M3 embeddings (↑ anomaly detection +30%).
Guardrails enforce structured, audit-ready outputs and prevent hallucinations.

projects.name: End-to-End Crop Yield Prediction — ScienceDirect
highlights: Significant uplift in forecast accuracy using ensembles (RF, GBM, XGBoost) on weather/soil/NDVI data.
100+ citations; included an interactive dashboard for agronomists.
